title: Blackhead Remover, Pore Minimizer & Unclogger, Gentle, All Natural - "More Than Clean" - For All Skin Types. Organic Ingredients to Clean, Shrink & Reduce Your Pores. You'll LOVE This! Money Back Guarantee EXTENDED For 1 Year!
description: Your Search For the Best, Most Effective, All Natural Blackhead Remover & Pore Minimizer is Over!Most women, regardless of age, experience large, clogged pores or blackheads at one point or another. In fact, those issues are high on the list of complaints that women have about their skin.Blackheads can be seemingly impossible to get rid of, like an uninvited guest who simply won't leave. It's time for a serious solution!"More Than Clean"contains a beautifying blend of non-toxic, gentle ingredients that penetrate, hydrate, and bust dirt, oil and impurities, effectively unclogging pores in the process.Laminaria Digitata powder is a sea kelp known for its skin conditioning benefits. Rich in Vitamins A, E, C, this potent seaweed pulls out impurities, boosts collagen production and fights against free radical damage.Bentonite is a healing clay comprised of aged volcano ash. Upon contact with water, Bentonite swells and acts just like a sponge, absorbing, and extracting toxins and impurities like blackheads.Apricot kernel oil is a gentle and light moisturizer, and is very effective on oily and blemish-prone skin because it penetrates the skin so easily, cutting through dirt and oil.And now for the piece de resistance, Lithothamnium Calcareum powder is our star ingredient!This is a true skin superfood. Packed with essential vitamins A, B, D, E and K, rich in omega 3 essential fatty acid and other healthy fats, and chock full of amino acid and antioxidants that penetrate deep down below the surface to heal and repair, sloughing off problem skin, dry patches, and imperfection to leave a clean, clear canvas in its wake.Try Vi-Tae's"More Than Clean"today and say "SAYONARA!" to blackheads and clogged, unsightly pores - and welcome the clean, fresh, rejuvenated skin you were meant to have.
